channel.title: Make a store mod+?
channel.description: hi im using pkplanet client, and for those of u that know, there is a donator item store in the front, can someone tell me how to make it so its only mod+?

item.title: Make a store mod+?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

That wouldn’t end well a-person. That message would be sent anytime those conditions aren’t met.

if (NPCID == ***) { if (playerRights > 0) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = *; } else { sM("..."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Make a store mod+?
item.dc:creator: @a-person a-person
item.description:
@a-person wrote:

Something like

else if ((NPCID == ID) && (playerRights >= 1)) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = X; } else { sendMessage("Message"); }

Maybe? also the sendmessage may be sM but i dont know about pkplanet

Read full topic
